Interface VoterRMIInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIServer

extends java.rmi.Remote

      • vote

        java.lang.String vote(int ID,
                      java.lang.String election,
                      java.lang.String list,
                      java.lang.String departamento)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        vote is cast in favor of a list or null
        Parameters:
        ID - identification number of the person who voted
        election - title of the election where the voter wants to vote
        list - name of the list which the voter wants to give his vote to (can be null)
        departamento - department name where the table where the vote was cast is located
        Returns:
        result(success or not)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call (mandatory)

      • listLists

        java.lang.String listLists(java.lang.String election,
                           int ID)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        shows all available lists to vote for a certain election from a certain type
        Parameters:
        election - election which we want to see the candidate list
        ID - identification number of cartao de cidadao of the person who wants to see the lists
        Returns:
        string with the result of the query (number of rows + ; + info + | + info + | ...
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call (mandatory)
